answer: Common symptoms of Diabetes include frequent urination, excessive thirst, increased hunger, fatigue, and blurred vision.

query: What are the symptoms of Malaria?
answer: Symptoms of Malaria include fever, chills, headache, nausea, and flu-like illness. They typically appear 10 to 15 days after the bite.

query: Malaria ke kya lakshan hote hain?

query: What are the symptoms of Influenza?

query: Influenza ke kya lakshan hote hain?

query: Influenza kis wajah se hota hai?

query: What are the symptoms of Asthma?

Asthma can be prevented by avoiding triggers such as allergens, smoke, and air pollution, and using prescribed medications regularly.

query: अस्थमा को कैसे रोका जा सकता है?
answer: अस्थमा को एलर्जी, धुआं और वायु प्रदूषण जैसे ट्रिगर्स से बचकर और निर्धारित दवाओं का नियमित रूप से उपयोग करके रोका जा सकता है।
Asthma ko allergy, dhuaan aur vayu pradushan jaise triggers se bachkar aur nirdharit davayon ka niyamit roop se upyog karke roka ja sakta hai.

query: What are the treatments available for Asthma?
answer: Treatment involves using inhalers to open airways, controlling inflammation with corticosteroids, and managing triggers.
Treatment involves using inhalers to open airways, controlling inflammation with corticosteroids, and managing triggers.
उपचार में वायुमार्ग को खोलने के लिए इनहेलर्स का उपयोग करना, कॉर्टिकोस्टेरॉइड्स के साथ सूजन को नियंत्रित करना और ट्रिगर्स को प्रबंधित करना शामिल है।
Upchar mein vayumarg ko kholne ke liye inhalers ka upyog karna, corticosteroids ke sath sujan ko niyantrit karna aur triggers ko prabandhit karna shamil hai.

query: What are the symptoms of Measles?
answer: Symptoms of Measles include a high fever, cough, runny nose, red eyes, and a rash of small red spots starting on the face.
Symptoms of Measles include a high fever, cough, runny nose, red eyes, and a rash of small red spots starting on the face.

query: Khasra ke kya lakshan hote hain?
answer: Khasra ke lakshan mein tej bukhar, behti naak, lal aankhen, aur chehre par shuru hone wale chhote lal dhabbon ka dana shamil hai.
Measles is a highly contagious viral infection caused by the measles virus, which spreads through the air when an infected person coughs or sneezes.

query: Khasra kis wajah se hota hai?
answer: Khasra ek atyadhik sankramak viral sankraman hai jo khasra virus ke karan hota hai, jo sankramit vyakti ke khansne ya chheenkne par hava ke madhyam se phailta hai.
The most effective way to prevent Measles is through vaccination with the MMR (measles, mumps, and rubella) vaccine.

query: खसरा को कैसे रोका जा सकता है?
answer: खसरा को रोकने का सबसे प्रभावी तरीका एमएमआर (खसरा, गलसुआ और रूबेला) वैक्सीन के साथ टीकाकरण है।
Khasra ko rokne ka sabse prabhavi tarika MMR (khasra, galsua aur rubella) vaccine ke sath tikakaran hai.

query: What are the treatments available for Measles?
answer: There is no specific treatment for Measles. Care is supportive, focusing on rest, hydration, and over-the-counter fever reducers.
There is no specific treatment for Measles. Care is supportive, focusing on rest, hydration, and over-the-counter fever reducers.
खसरा का कोई विशिष्ट उपचार नहीं है। देखभाल सहायक है, जो आराम, जलयोजन और ओवर-द-काउंटर बुखार कम करने वाली दवाओं पर केंद्रित है।
Khasra ka koi vishisht upchar nahin hai. Dekhbhal sahayak hai, jo aaram, jalayojan aur over-the-counter bukhar kam karne wali davayon par kendrit hai.

query: What are the symptoms of Cholera?
answer: Symptoms of Cholera include severe watery diarrhea, vomiting, rapid heart rate, and dehydration, which can lead to shock.
Symptoms of Cholera include severe watery diarrhea, vomiting, rapid heart rate, and dehydration, which can lead to shock.

query: Haija ke kya lakshan hote hain?
answer: Haija ke lakshan mein gambheer pani jaise dast, ulti, tez dil ki dhadkan aur nirjalikaran shamil hain, jisse jhatka lag sakta hai.
Cholera is an acute diarrheal disease caused by the bacterium Vibrio cholerae, often transmitted through contaminated water or food.

query: Haija kis wajah se hota hai?
answer: Haija ek teevra dast rog hai jo Vibrio cholerae namak jivanu ke karan hota hai, jo aksar dooshit pani ya bhojan ke madhyam se phailta hai.

query: हैजा को कैसे रोका जा सकता है?

Roktham mein surakshit pani aur swachhta tak pahunch sunishchit karna, uchit khadya swachhta aur ucch jokhim wale kshetron mein maukhik haija ke teeke shamil hain.

query: What are the treatments available for Cholera?
answer: Treatment involves rehydration therapy, either orally with a solution or intravenously, to replace lost fluids and electrolytes.
Treatment involves rehydration therapy, either orally with a solution or intravenously, to replace lost fluids and electrolytes.
उपचार में खोए हुए तरल पदार्थ और इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स को बदलने के लिए मौखिक रूप से या अंतःशिरा रूप से पुनर्जलीकरण थेरेपी शामिल है।
Upchar mein khoe hue taral padarth aur electrolytes ko badalne ke liye maukhik roop se ya antahshira roop se punarjalikaran therapy shamil hai.

query: What are the symptoms of Cardiovascular disease?
answer: Symptoms of Cardiovascular disease can include chest pain (angina), shortness of breath, pain in the arms or legs, and fatigue.
Symptoms of Cardiovascular disease can include chest pain (angina), shortness of breath, pain in the arms or legs, and fatigue.

query: हृदय रोग के लक्षण क्या हैं?
answer: हृदय रोग के लक्षणों में सीने में दर्द (एनजाइना), सांस लेने में तकलीफ, बाहों या पैरों में दर्द और थकान शामिल हो सकते हैं।

query: Hriday rog ke kya lakshan hote hain?
answer: Hriday rog ke lakshan mein seene mein dard (angina), saans lene mein takleef, bahon ya pairo mein dard aur thakan shamil ho sakte hain.
Causes include a sedentary lifestyle, unhealthy diet, smoking, high blood pressure, and high cholesterol. Genetics can also play a role.

query: Why do people get heart disease?
answer: Causes include a sedentary lifestyle, unhealthy diet, smoking, high blood pressure, and high cholesterol. Genetics can also play a role.

query: हृदय रोग का कारण क्या है?
answer: इसके कारणों में गतिहीन जीवनशैली, अस्वास्थ्यकर आहार, धूम्रपान, उच्च रक्तचाप और उच्च कोलेस्ट्रॉल शामिल हैं। आनुवंशिकी भी एक भूमिका निभा सकती है।

query: Heart disease kis wajah se hota hai?
answer: Iske kaaranon mein gatiheen jeevanshaili, aswasthya kar aahar, dhumrapan, ucch raktchaap aur ucch cholesterol shamil hain. Anuvanshiki bhi ek bhumika nibha sakti hai.

query: How can we prevent Cardiovascular disease?
answer: Prevention involves maintaining a healthy lifestyle, including a balanced diet, regular physical activity, managing blood pressure and cholesterol, and quitting smoking.

query: What is the prevention for heart disease?
answer: Prevention involves maintaining a healthy lifestyle, including a balanced diet, regular physical activity, managing blood pressure and cholesterol, and quitting smoking.

query: हृदय रोग को कैसे रोका जा सकता है?
answer: रोकथाम में एक स्वस्थ जीवन शैली बनाए रखना शामिल है, जिसमें संतुलित आहार, नियमित शारीरिक गतिविधि, रक्तचाप और कोलेस्ट्रॉल का प्रबंधन और धूम्रपान छोड़ना शामिल है।
Roktham mein ek swasth jeevan shaili banaye rakhna shamil hai, jismein santulit aahar, niyamit sharirik gatividhi, raktchaap aur cholesterol ka prabandhan aur dhumrapan chhodna shamil hai.

query: What are the treatments available for Cardiovascular disease?
answer: Treatment can include medications like blood thinners, lifestyle changes, and surgical procedures such as angioplasty or bypass surgery.
Treatment can include medications like blood thinners, lifestyle changes, and surgical procedures such as angioplasty or bypass surgery.

query: हृदय रोग का उपचार क्या है?
answer: उपचार में रक्त पतला करने वाली दवाएं, जीवनशैली में बदलाव और एंजियोप्लास्टी या बाईपास सर्जरी जैसी शल्य चिकित्सा प्रक्रियाएं शामिल हो सकती हैं।

query: Hriday rog ka ilaaj kya hai?
answer: Upchar mein rakt patla karne wali davayen, jeevanshaili mein badlav aur angioplasty ya bypass surgery jaisi shalya chikitsa prakriyayen shamil ho sakti hain.

query: What are the symptoms of Cancer?
answer: Symptoms of Cancer vary, but common signs include unexplained weight loss, fatigue, a lump or thickening under the skin, and changes in bowel or bladder habits.
Symptoms of Cancer vary, but common signs include unexplained weight loss, fatigue, a lump or thickening under the skin, and changes in bowel or bladder habits.

query: Cancer ke kya lakshan hote hain?
answer: Cancer ke lakshan alag-alag hote hain, lekin samanya lakshan mein aspashtikrit vajan ghatna, thakan, tvacha ke niche ganth ya mota hona aur mal tyag ya mutrashay ki aadat mein badlav shamil hain.
Cancer is caused by genetic mutations that allow cells to grow uncontrollably. These mutations can be inherited or caused by environmental factors like tobacco smoke, radiation, and viruses.

query: Cancer kis wajah se hota hai?
answer: Cancer anuvanshik utparivartan ke karan hota hai jo koshikaon ko aniyantrit roop se badhne ki anumati deta hai. Ye utparivartan virasat mein mil sakte hain ya tambaku ke dhuen, vikiran aur virus jaise paryavaraniy karakon ke karan ho sakte hain.
Prevention includes avoiding tobacco, maintaining a healthy weight, eating a healthy diet, limiting alcohol, and getting regular cancer screenings.
Prevention includes avoiding tobacco, maintaining a healthy weight, eating a healthy diet, limiting alcohol, and getting regular cancer screenings.

query: कैंसर को कैसे रोका जा सकता है?
answer: रोकथाम में तंबाकू से परहेज, स्वस्थ वजन बनाए रखना, स्वस्थ आहार लेना, शराब को सीमित करना और नियमित कैंसर स्क्रीनिंग करवाना शामिल है।

query: What are the treatments available for Cancer?
answer: Treatment for Cancer can include surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, and targeted drug therapy.
